Edges-Weird -- Male Veteran Adventurer
Attributes (6 Points):
Agility: d4 Smarts: d4 Spirit: d12 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes:
Grit: Reduces penalties vs. fear by 2
Guts: May reroll Vigor vs. fear
Knack (Storm Born): Ignores penalties on benny reroll vs. fear
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Gambling: (sma) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Battle: (sma) d4 Language (English): (sma) d4 Shooting: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Faith: (spi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4
Skill Notes:
Bad Eyes: -1 on visual trait rolls
Hard Of Hearing+: Deaf, automatically fails Notice (hearing)
Size: 0 Deity: None
Advances: 8 Improvement Points: 20 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 2; Edge: 18
Features
Edges (10 points): Arcane Background (Blessed); Grit; Guts; Knack (Bastard); Knack (Born On All Hallows' Eve); Knack (Born On Christmas); Knack (Breech Birth); Knack (Seventh Son); Knack (Shooting Star); Knack (Storm Born) Hindrances: Bad Eyes; Hard Of Hearing+; Obligation Human Features: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Blessed): Violating core beliefs inflicts -2 Faith for 1 wk; major sins remove powers
Knack (Bastard): May spend a benny to see invisible and hidden creatures for 5 rd
Knack (Born On All Hallows'Eve): May spend Conviction to reroll critical failure
Knack (Seventh Son): May spend a benny to negate a benny effect
Obligation: Has regular responsibility that occupies 20 hr/wk
Combat
Parry: 4 (2) Cover: 2 Toughness: 8 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Rattler Hide Duster Shield: Medium Native Shield Weapons: Baton; Knife (d4+d4 R3"); Unarmed
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Knack (Born On Christmas): May spend a benny to negate power effect and shake caster (Spirit-4 neg)
Knack (Breech Birth): May spend a benny to heal 1 wound
Knack (Shooting Star): May spend a benny to dbl Command range for remainder of encounter
Arcana
Power Count: 3 Power Points: 15
Arcana Notes: Arcane Background (Blessed): 3 Powers/15 Power Points/Critical failure causes fatigue
